about.title: About Bjørn
about.subtitle: Certified AI Business Professional with 20+ years of experience in digital commerce & marketing.
about.description:
My career is a conscious journey along innovation: from executive roles at tech giants like Sony and Samsung, where I introduced the first Chromebooks in the Netherlands, to building my own craft beer brand. The common thread? Always the question: how can technology make our work truly smarter?

With the rise of AI, everything fell into place. I decided to certify as an AI Business Professional to help organizations not only talk about AI, but actually do it. Whether you are a startup needing an investor-ready plan or an established organization that doesn't want to miss the AI boat: I speak the language of the boardroom and the shop floor. Because I don't believe in technology for technology's sake, but in impact. Let's look together at how we can make your ambitions a reality.
